According to\nGandhi\u2019s ahimsa ( non-violence ) , it was OK to kill Germans , but NOT at all\nOK to kill the Brits who had make us their slaves and robbed us blind. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gandhi was brainwashed and\nimported to India from South Africa where he recruited&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indian soldiers enmasse\nfor both the world wars, to support Rothschild ( the owner of British East India company ) in creating the state of Israel.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>111000 Indian soldiers were killed in WW1 and 243000 Indian soldiers were killed in WW2-- to shore up the evil British masters.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gandhi did NOT drive\naway the Brits. This happened due to an event deleted from history both by the\nBrits and by stooge Indian leaders. &nbsp;It did NOT suit both the parties.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Alexander's closest\nfriend Hephaestion, got terribly jealous when Alexander started sleeping\nwith a hermaphrodite ( she-male ) by the name of Bagoas, ( his &nbsp;<i>eromenos</i> ) during their war campaign.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">After the death of Hephaestion, &nbsp;Alexander the Great began to exhibit signs of acute\nmegalomania and paranoid schizophrenia. &nbsp;His\nextraordinary achievements, coupled with his own ineffable sense of destiny and\nthe flattery of his companions, &nbsp;combined\nto produce this effect.</span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; In the process I have examined over 10 million patients and\nconducted over 700,000 eye operations, which I am told is a world record. &nbsp;Somebody compared me to Henry Ford, &nbsp;saying I had brought conveyor belt technology\nto the field of eye-care. &nbsp;My way of\nlooking at things has not been affected by the ageing process at all. &nbsp;I am just an ordinary man. &nbsp;I will serve as long as God wants me to. &nbsp;For me, my patient is my god, the operating\nroom is my temple and my instruments are my puja. &nbsp;My work has therefore been my\npilgrimage.\" &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">He had his first\nmeeting with the Indian Tech minister Mr Unnikrishnan \u2013 a sharp and level\nheaded politician, who had returned six times to Lok Sabha, from Badagara\nconstituency, next to my hometown . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The entire group was\nwaiting for Sam to appear. &nbsp;And there he breezes\nin , fashionably late. &nbsp;All must wait for\nthe messiah right? &nbsp;He tells the minister\n\u201c Hi , you must have heard of me , I am Sam Pitroda\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the meeting , his\nhuge ego occupied the whole room and he rubbed everybody the wrong way.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Finally Unnikrishnan\ntold him \u201c I do NOT need messiahs!! \u201d</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After this electric\nshock Satyanarayan Gangaram Pitroda\u2014OOPS\u2014Sam got his messiah syndrome rearranged.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The waitress turned\nempress decided to use Satyanarayan Gangaram Pitroda \u2013nay- Sam Pitroda on\ntwitter to engage the Indian youth. &nbsp;Sam\nwould show Indian techies &nbsp;how much the\nIndia had developed under the queen bee.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Well to cut a long\nstory short, Satyanarayan Gangaram Pitroda \u2013nay- Sam Pitroda got stung very\nbadly, the youth of India let him have it, where it hurts the most . &nbsp;They had been monitoring this messiah closely,\napparently.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is all right to be\non top of an ivory tower and get rave reviews from monopolized media, it is a\ndifferent thing when free speech is allowed .. It is NOT that the Indian youth\nis unruly , for Narendra Modi engages the youth on social media in an exemplary\nmanner.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-iRyHm8Ovm6U/Ua_959vBnhI/AAAAAAAAjBw/M4xAHDhVsdc/s1600/Sam-Pitroda.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-iRyHm8Ovm6U/Ua_959vBnhI/AAAAAAAAjBw/M4xAHDhVsdc/s400/Sam-Pitroda.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unnikrishnan did NOT\njump into conclusions.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He observed this man carefully for the messiah syndrome.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>There was a grandiose\nsense of self-importance. There was this tendency NOT to acknowledge imperfections.&nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>He required excessive admiration and respect . He had a sense of entitlement,\ni.e., unreasonable expectations of &nbsp;automatic compliance with his expectations .&nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>There was this lack of &nbsp;empathy -\nunwilling to recognize or identify with the needs of others . There was this arrogant\nattitude and inflated feeling of personal ability, privilege, or infallibility.\n<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>The messianic wish is\nnot merely a general wish for improved conditions and for changes for the\nbetter, but the wish of that private person to become personally the redeemer\nof the world . It's a secret fondness to be noticed. It's a love of supremacy. It's\ndrawing attention to themselves in conversation. It's enjoying being flattered\nby the team. <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>There was this noble\nimpulse to come to rescue of the sufferers even when there is no real necessity.\nThere was this fixation and obsession on \"I,\" \"me,\"\n\"my\" and \"mine,\" and the need to to draw attention. There\nwas this mental stubbornness ..There was this exaggeration of own importance\nand past achievements.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Messiahs try to set\ngoals that are unrealistic . There is a &nbsp;belief that all others in the team or those\nthat surround you are subservient or in some way beneath you..&nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>The messiah sees\nhimself as the &nbsp;one visionary who can\nsave the world and restore utopia, even if they have to drag everyone else\nkicking and screaming to get there, because they are the only ones that\nunderstand things as they are.</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-tDMMt7Mmyw8/UbACveVt_WI/AAAAAAAAjCA/8aEUxttQ65U/s1600/JFV.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"315\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-tDMMt7Mmyw8/UbACveVt_WI/AAAAAAAAjCA/8aEUxttQ65U/s320/JFV.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Steve Jobs&nbsp;&nbsp;was a narcissist who failed to grasp that his\ncompany belongs to its shareholders. A messianic CEOs can never come to see the\ncompany they run as being public-- they see the company as being theirs. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Apple lived by their icon. They could have\nvery well impaled themselves on this icon, for all we care. In my scheme of\naffairs glitzy I Pad and I Phone means nothing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Without any formal\ntraining in electronics and computer science and without commensurate achievements a narcissist expects royal treatment. Unlike Bill Gates , Ste Jobs loved to see\nhis name on top of every list. &nbsp;He overexamined and downgraded other people,\nprojects, statements, or dreams in an unrealistic manner.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stebe Jobs could NOT\nsettle upon a suitable successor, despite bad health . His messianic sense of\nself would not allow that process to be set in motion. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When he showed up at a\nstaff party in the early eighties dressed as Jesus, there were no shortages of\neye rolling going on. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thank god Steve Jobs ,\n(who will never drown out his inner voice ) , was NOT a leader in the\npharmaceutical industry-- the rich man would have his fantastic medicines--\nright?&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here was a man&nbsp; who overpriced everything he sold and sued\neveryone that made the product better.&nbsp; Steve\nJobs has listed himself as CO-INVENTOR of 103 separate Apple patents. Just like\nEdison who never invented a single thing, but has maximum patents in his name\n-- everything was done by the scientists he employed, but hogged all credit for\nhimself. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Calling him a visionary\nis an insult to people like Nikola Tesla who really are. Never confuse\ninvention with innovation. Furthermore never confuse innovation with glorified\ncraftmanship.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He denied his&nbsp; own once-illegitimate daughter and she had to\nlive on welfare for 2 years because he just being himself.&nbsp; He even denied paternity by claiming he was\nsterile. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why do people all over\nthe world use Windows? &nbsp;Because Steve\nJobs was being himself when his king sized ego forced him to lock Apple out of\nthe market.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-mZKhBYN6wJs/UbBQl2wGPYI/AAAAAAAAjCQ/VwF9YTOeQqs/s1600/A.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-mZKhBYN6wJs/UbBQl2wGPYI/AAAAAAAAjCQ/VwF9YTOeQqs/s1600/A.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Any idiot can surround\nhimself with outstanding geniuses in the field and harrass them in a mean\nmanner, till they deliver a damn good product--and then claim all the credit\nfor himself. This is only possible in an organisation which Steve Jobs lead , where\nthere was NIL transparency and everything is on a strict \"need to\nknow\" basis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Steve Jobs had this grandiose\nsense of self-importance. &nbsp;Narcissism,\nalso called malignant self love-- the trait of excessive self-love, is rooted in ego. Narcissistic personality disorder is closely linked to\nself-centeredness. . He is interpersonally exploitative, i.e., takes advantage\nof others to achieve his or her own ends .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A narcissist is preoccupied with\nfantasies of unlimited success, power and brilliance. Low self esteem in childhood\ncould be the &nbsp;underlying cause of\nnarcissistic behavior in adult life, when you are doing well.&nbsp; Beneath the cover of superiority, which is in\nfact a fragile ego state built to support and sustain, lays insecurity,\ninadequacy, shame and even fear.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They react &nbsp;to criticism with anger, shame, or humiliation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A narcissist lacks\nempathy and is unwilling to recognize or identify with the feelings of others. &nbsp;Arrogance is in the blood. &nbsp;They have difficulty separating issues from\ntheir ego or personal reactions to the topic.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No wonder when he came to India as a young hippie he got bashed up by\nthe public.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is this true\nstory about \u201caSshole \u201c Steve Jobs. He had to interview a young candidate who\napplied for a job.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>He sarcastically starts\noff by asking \u201cHow old were you when you lost your virginity?\"<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>The candidate was taken\naback, bu kept quiet.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\u201cWhat did you say?\u201d\n\u201cAre you a virgin?\u201d Jobs asks again.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Now the candidate was\nreally flustered.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Steve Jobs attacks\nagain&nbsp; \u201cHow many times have you taken\nLSD?\u201d<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>One of the panel\nHertzfeld recalled, \u201cThe poor guy was turning varying shades of red, so I tried\nto change the subject and asked a straight forward technical question.\u201d<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>But when the candidate\nstarted responding , Jobs crashes in again and snarls \u201cGobble, gobble, gobble,\ngobble,\u201d.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>So the poor gut tells\nSmith and Hertzfeld. \u201cI guess I\u2019m not the right guy here!\u201d .<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>He got up quietly and\nleft-- happy to be away from this control freak.</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is what you must\ndo when attacked personally by the messiah \u2014just pull the dang plug.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">I am sure many of my\nreaders understand and have experienced corporate narcissism . This occurs when\na narcissist becomes the leader (CEO) or a member of the senior management team\nand gathers an adequate mix of co-dependents around him to support his\nnarcissistic behavior. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-qsOOVDI5Q4U/UbBSYuBdBbI/AAAAAAAAjCg/VwJH4TFGUjE/s1600/uighui.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-qsOOVDI5Q4U/UbBSYuBdBbI/AAAAAAAAjCg/VwJH4TFGUjE/s1600/uighui.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Have you seen the thick skinned and desh drohi coterie\naround the waitress turned empress?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Few of the people who\nsuffer from the messiah syndrome actually are clinical cases suffering from\nschizophrenia, a mental disorder distinguished by a loss of contact with\nreality and the occurrence of psychotic behaviors, including hallucinations and\ndelusions. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Grandiose delusions are\nfrequently found predominantly in paranoid schizophrenia, in which a person has\nan extremely exaggerated sense of his or her significance, personality,\nknowledge, or authority. &nbsp;Think of the\npeople who have revelatory driven experiences and even started new religions. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most of the time after\nthese people die, some opportunists create a false legacy, write a holy book ,\ncreating a propaganda that they actually heard the dead guy saying all\nthis.&nbsp; The dead messiah need NOT be even literate.\n&nbsp;They then call it the gospel. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bipolar disorder is a severe affective dysregulation, or mood states that sway from exceedingly low\n(depression) to exceptionally high (mania). In the most severe form, known as\npsychotic mania, the bipolar patient may hear voices and have grandiose\ndelusions such as \"I am the son of God\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The last in the line of\nmessiahs\u2019 is the founder of the Mormon religion. &nbsp;A Mormon by the name of Mitt Romney almost\nbecame US president recently.</span> <o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-4x1NVzT6jIw/UbC_uTIxh9I/AAAAAAAAjCw/qpZ22XhCeRM/s1600/imagesCA91NDBH.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"148\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-4x1NVzT6jIw/UbC_uTIxh9I/AAAAAAAAjCw/qpZ22XhCeRM/s400/imagesCA91NDBH.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nPunch into Google search <span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>MORMONS &nbsp;BANKROLLED BY ROTHSCHILD &nbsp;VADAKAYIL</b></span><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Grandiose delusions ,\nwhere the person has a greatly out-of-proportion sense of their own worth in\nthe world are related to lesions of the frontal lobe. While temporal lobe\nlesions have been mainly reported in patients with persecution mania.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Jew sees himself as\n'the eternal victim' of persecution, although he is more likely to be the\npersecutor, rather than the persecuted. This reverse-thinking is a typically\nJewish delusion.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-wJzq__ZIyYs/UbDDLjkcWjI/AAAAAAAAjDA/FdhJRLRPtH0/s1600/images+(6).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"263\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-wJzq__ZIyYs/UbDDLjkcWjI/AAAAAAAAjDA/FdhJRLRPtH0/s400/images+(6).jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Messiah Complex may\nalso refer to a person who has formed a habit of \"creating\" crisis in\na given culture, only to later \"rescue\" or \"save\" the poor\nhelpless soul upon whom the crisis has been perpetrated.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">How do you spot a\nperson with the messiah complex as opposed to a good Samaritan who sees a dire need\nand tries to fix it?&nbsp; People with a Messiah\ncomplex tend to be controllers and manipulators. They will use emotional\ntriggers e.g. \u201cWe must do it for our children\u201d and \u201cThink of the penquins \u201d\netc. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Messiah complex is the will,\nintention, compulsion to be a messiah, to be the redeemer and savior of the\nworld. He believes that he is the one destined to deliver the goods. &nbsp;He needs to taking advantage of others to\nreach own goals. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He requires constant\nattention and positive reinforcement from others. He thrives on excessive\nadmiration and is in the lookout for fans and fathu publicity. &nbsp;He believes in his invulnerability or does not\nrecognize his limitations. He creates a belief that he is carrying a heroic\nburden on his head. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Messiah complex\ndoes not carry any danger to life as long as it does not grow into mania. &nbsp;When the messiah complex tends to grow into\nthe stubborn maniac syndrome, preventive medical assistance is called for, for\nsuch people can be the cause of serious troubles in society. &nbsp;&nbsp;He feels\nthat a certain divine \u201cchosen\u201d mission is confined to him and that he has to\nfulfill it at any cost &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Have you ever checked\nthe psyche of the Naxal supporters\u2014like Arundhati Roy?.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sigmund Freud suffered\nfrom the &nbsp;messiah complex himself. He\ncreated many psychological theories, mostly lifting them from Vedic texts (without\nproper understanding). &nbsp;He wanted to save\nhumanity from these terrible conditions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The megalomaniac\ndiffers from the narcissist by the fact that he wishes to be powerful rather\nthan charming, and seeks to be feared rather than loved. To this type belong\nmany lunatics and most of the great men of history. &nbsp;Narcissistic individuals use various\nstrategies to protect the self at the expense of others. They tend to devalue,\nderogate and blame others, and they respond to threatening feedback with anger\nand hostility.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Rrz_ELegr9I/UbDiLaeFUdI/AAAAAAAAjDg/aBFng5eHbSc/s1600/images.jpgigvdf.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Rrz_ELegr9I/UbDiLaeFUdI/AAAAAAAAjDg/aBFng5eHbSc/s1600/images.jpgigvdf.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The superiority complex\nis one of the ways which a person with an inferiority complex may use as a\nmethod of escape from &nbsp;his difficulties. &nbsp;He assumes that he is superior when &nbsp;he is not, and this false success compensates &nbsp;him for the state of inferiority which he\ncannot bear. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Ego Complex stems from\nthe conviction that \u2018I am the center of the Universe\u2019 and that one`s own\ndesires should be satisfied instantly, whereas those of the others might wait.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ZJT89iPQSPg/UbDiUbMFczI/AAAAAAAAjDw/9_7CjOgncdw/s1600/kij.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ZJT89iPQSPg/UbDiUbMFczI/AAAAAAAAjDw/9_7CjOgncdw/s320/kij.jpg\" width=\"242\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Messiah claimants are a\nmajor tradition in Judaism. &nbsp;Because the\nmessianic vocation is such an essential component in Jewish national striving,\nit becomes not just a part of the national consciousness, but also a part of\nthe private consciousness. &nbsp;And even if\nit does not find its expression in overt and explicit thought, it nevertheless\nfinds its expression as an incoherent and hidden striving, as a messianic\ncomplex.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-sweAHK8TvxA/UbDiQIqMxwI/AAAAAAAAjDo/DmMtG1nd8L0/s1600/images.jpgHUFU.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-sweAHK8TvxA/UbDiQIqMxwI/AAAAAAAAjDo/DmMtG1nd8L0/s1600/images.jpgHUFU.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Moses suffered from the\nmessiah complex. For 40 long years he led his people round and round , when all\nit required was a few days of good leadership spirit and a hop step and jump from\nEgypt to Palestine.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><b>Grace and peace!</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">BHARATVARSHA &nbsp;WORLD KINGDOM </span>&nbsp;,&nbsp;\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">BHARATA ELDEST SON OF EMPEROR RISHABA AND ELDER BROTHER OF BAHUBALI</span> ,\n<span style=\"color: purple;\">ABHIGNANA SHAKUNTALA &nbsp;A &nbsp;FAKE SANSKRIT PLAY WRITTEN BY ROTHSCHILD\u2019S\nAGENTS </span>&nbsp;, &nbsp;VARDHAMANA MAHAVIRA THE 24<sup>TH</sup>\nTHIRTHANKARA ,&nbsp; FAKE &nbsp;NINE GEMS OF &nbsp;NON-EXISTANT &nbsp;KING VIKRAMADITYA OF 600 AD , &nbsp;<span style=\"color: magenta;\">RISHABHA &nbsp;FOUNDER OF JAINISM AND THE FIRST JAIN THIRTHANKARA</span>\n, &nbsp;KALIDASA PROPAGANDIST &nbsp;GERMAN POET JOHANN WOLFGANG VON &nbsp;GOETHE</b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> - &nbsp;CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span><br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4493948469647562661\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_142M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/09/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_5.html?showComment=1536514353438#c4493948469647562661\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 9, 2018 at 11:02 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_142MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEBODY CALLED ME AND CRIED--<br /><br />I AM CONFUSED-- WHY IS KRISHNA CALLING ARJUNA SO MANY NAMES<br /><br />1) SON OF BHARATA<br />2) DESCENDANT OF BHARATA<br />3) BEST OF BHARATAS<br />4) SCION OF BHARATA<br /><br />AAKHIR YEH BHARAT KAUN HAI BHAIYYA-- KAUN SA KHET KA BEET ROT HAI YEH IS HE THE SON OF SHAKUNTALA ?<br /><br />BALLS !<br /><br />SHAKUNTALA NEVER EXISTED.. KALIDASA WHO CREATED SHAKUNTALA NEVER EXISTED...<br /><br />KALIDASA WAS CREATED AND BACKDATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD .. TO HIJACK ANCIENT INDIAN HISTORY.. TO SHOW THAT BIG BAND OF BIBLE IN 4004 BC IS RELEVANT..<br /><br />WHAT IS THE TRUTH?<br /><br />BHARATA WAS SON OF EMPEROR RISHABHA WAS WAS BORN IN 8190 BC.. RISHABHA WAS THE SON OF NABHI RAJA..GRANDSON OF AGNIDHARA , GREAT GRANDSON OF PRIYA VARTA ( 8255 BC )<br /><br />BHARATA + RISHABHA ( BHARATARSHABHA ) RULED THE WHOLE PLANET...<br /><br />RISHABHA NAMED HIS SON BHARATA AFTER THE LAND OF BHARATA<br /><br />BHARATA THE LAND MASS IS DERIVED FROM THE SHABDHA BRAHMAN TERM ( BHAVA + RAGA + TALA ) BHA + RA + TA !!<br /><br />IN BHAGAWAD GITA KRISHNA CALLS ARJUNA BHARATARSHABHA --AND THIS HAS BEEN TRANSLATELY WRONLY BY EVER BODY AS -- O BULL AMONG BHARATAS..<br /><br />BALLS !<br /><br />BHARATARSHABHA MEANS FIRST NAME BHARAT + SURNAME RISHABHA ..<br /><br />POOR JAINS DONT EVEN KNOW THEIR OWN HISTORY..<br /><br />IF I DONT REVEAL THIS--IT WILL NEVER BE REVEALED TILL THE SUN GOES SUPERNOVA..<br /><br />AND I HAVE HALF A MIND NOT TO REVEAL IT AS JAINS HAVE BEEN TRAITORS TO BHARATAMATA..<br /><br />THE RICHEST JAINS ARE CRYPTO JEWS WHO RUN THE DIAMOND MAFIA IN ANTWERP AND DUBAI-- WHO HAVE BUILD AKSHARDHAM TEMPLES FOR GHANSHYAM PANDE..<br /><br />BUDDHIRM DIED IN INDIA BUT IT FLOURISHED ABROAD..<br /><br />JAINISM NEVER WENT ABROAD..<br /><br /><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">VARDHAMANA MAHAVIRA IS JUST THE 24TH THIRTHANKARA<br /><br />THE FIRST THIRTHANKARA IS ACTUALLY BAHUBALI SON OF RISHBHA , SON OF SUNANDA, BROTHER OF SUNDARI-- AND HALF BROTHER OF BHARATA..</span></b><br /><br />HOW WAS JAINISM BORN?<br /></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">The white historian has put Mahavira as a contemporary of Buddha at 599 BC. This is wrong . First of all Mahavira was just a reformer. He was the 24th Thirtankara . And he was born in 4500 BC.</span><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br /><div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">IN REALITY BAHUBALI IS THE FIRST THIRTHANKARA..</span><span style=\"font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<br />MY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">59.23 %..</span></b><br /><br /><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">BUT BAHUBALI BECAME A MONK AND HIS USELESS SON SOMAKRITI HAD NO CHILDREN\u2026<br /><br />THIS WHY JAINS CHOSE HIS FATHER THE GREAT EMPEROR RISHABHA AS THE FIRST THIRTHANKARA ( OPPORTUNISM AT ITS BEST )<br /><br />THERE WAS A SCHISM IN THE ROYAL BLOODLINE\u2014AS MAHUBALI AND HIS HALF BROTHER HAD A FIGHT..</span></b><br /><br /><div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">Bharata was chosen by Emperor Rishabha to be his successor as he was loved by all and was level headed. Bahubali was an expert in Ayurveda and spent most of his time in Kerala learning Kalari ..</span></div>\n<br />After conquering the whole Bharata sent a communication to his brothers to accept his order. After an initial hesitation 98 brothers accepted Bharata\u2019s order.. .<br /><br />Now Bahubali ( son of Sunanda ) was left. When the messenger came to him with message he said \u2013 \u201cO messenger! Go and tell your emperor Bharat that Bahubali isn\u2019t like his brothers who became Sadhus leaving the kingdom.<br /><br />CONTINUED TO 2--<br />\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_142BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_142b+seedDigeD\" kind=\"d\"><div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_141T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_141TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_141TN\"><div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_141TD\">\n<span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></div>\n</span></span><ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_141TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_141B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4474020595891003887\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_141M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/09/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_5.html?showComment=1536514399857#c4474020595891003887\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 9, 2018 at 11:03 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_141MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">CONTINUED FROM 1--</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">Finally emperor Bharat attacked on Takshshila kingdom of Bahubali. Army of both sides fought hard. Sometimes army of Bharat dominated army of Bahubali and sometimes vice versa.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">Seeing mass destruction in war it was decided that there should be a single combat between Bharat and Bahubali . One who wins will be the only Chakravarti or \"Emperor of Emperors\".</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">In all the stages of battle Bharat had to face terrible defeat at the hands of his younger brother Bahubali in all these fights.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">When a point came that Bahubali must give a lethal strike on his elder half brother Bharata, he raised his hand . He felt that his own sister Sundari and step sister Brahmi ( of script Brahmi Lipi fame ) were on the side of Bharata.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">Instead of giving the final fatal blow, he suddenly uprooted a large tuft of hair from his own head instead, thus declaring himself as a monk, stunning all .</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">After ruling for several years Bharata also became a wandering saint, like his father and brother..</span><br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Bahubali spent many years in meditation and severe penance. He was unable to become a Jivan Mukt as his enemity with Bharata scorched his soul..</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">But one fine day Bharata came to him ,( standing naked and doing tapasya totally entangled in creepers )and worshipped him\u2014and his ego left him and he attained instant moksha ..</span></span><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">BAHUBALIs STATUE IS AT SHRAVANABELAGOLA KARNATAKA .\u2014IT IS A PLACE OF PILGRIMAGE FOR JAINS</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jim7QdrYmyg</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">SPREAD THIS TRUTH AMONG JAINS\u2026</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\u091a\u0924\u0941\u0930\u094d\u0935\u093f\u0927\u093e \u092d\u091c\u0928\u094d\u0924\u0947 \u092e\u093e\u0902 \u091c\u0928\u093e: \u0938\u0941\u0915\u0943\u0924\u093f\u0928\u094b\u093d\u0930\u094d\u091c\u0941\u0928 |</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\u0906\u0930\u094d\u0924\u094b \u091c\u093f\u091c\u094d\u091e\u093e\u0938\u0941\u0930\u0930\u094d\u0925\u093e\u0930\u094d\u0925\u0940 \u091c\u094d\u091e\u093e\u0928\u0940 \u091a&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\u092d\u0930\u0924\u0930\u094d\u0937\u092d</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">&nbsp;|| 16|| BHAGWAWAD GITA 7.16- 4000 BC&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">chatur-vidh\u0101 bhajante m\u0101\u1e41 jan\u0101\u1e25 suk\u1e5bitino \u2019rjuna</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\u0101rto jij\u00f1\u0101sur arth\u0101rth\u012b j\u00f1\u0101n\u012b cha&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">bharatar\u1e63habha</span><br /><br /><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">O Arjuna descendant of Bharata Rishabha</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">, four kinds of pious people engage in my devotion\u2014the distressed, the seekers after knowledge, the seekers of worldly possessions, and those who are situated in knowledge.</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">capt ajit vadakayil</span><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">..</span></div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</div>\n</span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 19, 2018 at 6:01 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_2MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nDear Captain,<br />\n<br />\nPlease clear a doubt of mine...in the verse \"yada yada hi dharmasya, glanirbhavati Bha-ra-ta\"<br />\n...is Bha-ra-ta a reference to the land of India or Arjuna? Because the true meaning changes the entire context of the verse.
