margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/08/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html?showComment=1534685095201#c4695860569389215722\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 19, 2018 at 6:54 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_1MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br />\nyada yada hi dharmasya<br />\nglanir bhavati BHARATA<br />\nabhyutthanam adharmasya<br />\ntadatmanam srjamy aham<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nWhenever and wherever there is a decline in religious practice, in BHA-RA-TA ( INDIA ) and a predominant rise of irreligion\u2014at that time I descend Myself.<br />\n<br />\nARJUNA IS A DESCENDANT OF BHARATA THE EMPEROR .. THE WHITE INVADER INJECTED POISON AND REPLACED LAND BHARAT WITH BHARATA ( SON OF SHAKUNTALA WHO NEVER EXISTED )<br />\n<br />\nBHARATA ( ARJUNAs ANCESTOR ) IS NAMED AFTER BHARATA ( LAND)<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">BHA / BHAVA- EMOTION<br />RA / RAGA- MELODY<br />TA / TALA- RHYTHM</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">Natya Shastra like Vedas have NO author as it is a SRUTI . The white invader converted Bharata into a MUNI ( sage ).&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/04/kathakali-dance-form-of-kerala-capt.html</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b>THE ANCESTOR OF PANDAVAS AND KAURAVAS WAS BHARATA ( 8165 BC ) SON OF RISHABHA (8190 BC ) AND ELDER BROTHER OF BAHUBALI</b></span></div>\n<br />\nThe story of Shakuntala has been added as an appendage in the Mahabharata ( Adiparva chapter ) by Jew Rothschild..<br />\n<br />\nCRYPTO JEW Raja Ravi Varma who painted the non-existent Radha ( mistress of Lord Krishna ) does the honours for Shakuntala too.<br />\n<br />\nEmperor Rishabha ( Adinath ) , the father of Chakravatri Bharata is considered as the first Thirthankara. Mahavira was the 24th Thirthankara..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD PUT MONKEY HANUMAN ON THE FLAG OF ARJUNAs CHARIOT.. THE REAL FLAG WAS KRISHNAs FLAG EMBLAZONED WITH VISHNUs CARRIER GARUDA..<br />\n<br />\nBEFORE THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA THERE WAS NOT A SINGLE TEMPLE FOR HANUMAN , THE GOD OF THE DEVADASIS ..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/02/devadasi-system-immoral-lie-of-temple.html</span><br />\nWHEN THE WHITE INVADER LEFT INDIA IN 1947 THERE WERE 20 TIMES MORE HANUMAN TEMPLES THAN RAM TEMPLES..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/09/garuda-vimana-of-vishnu-and-garuda.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">ROTHSCHILD REMOVED SHRADDHA FROM BHAGAWAD GITA AND INSERTED BHAKTI..</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE WORD BHAKTI DOES NOT APPEAR IN THE ORIGINAL BHAGAWAD GITA AT ALL.</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html</span><br />\nI WANT MY READERS TO SPREAD THIS COMMENT TO EVERY HINDU OUTFIT AND STALWART,,&nbsp; &nbsp; WE HAVE TO RECLAIM SANATANA DHARMA WHICH HAS BEEN HIJACKED BY TRAITORS ..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\nNCERT<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nCJI<br />\nATTORNEY GENERAL<br />\nALL CMs OF INDIA<br />\nALL CENTRAL/ STATE MINISTERS AND MINISTRIES<br />\nGOVERNORS OF ALL STATES<br />\nDGPs OF ALL STATES<br />\nIGs OF ALL STATES<br />\nPRESIDENT OF INDIA<br />\nVP OF INDIA<br />\nSPEAKER LOK SABHA<br />\nSPEAKER RAJYA SABHA<br />\nSWAMY<br />\nGURUMURTHY<br />\nRAJIV MALHOTRA<br />\nALL BJP SPOKESMEN<br />\nRSS<br />\nVHP<br />\nAVBP<br />\nALL BJP SPOKESMEN<br />\nROMILA THAPAR<br />\nIRFAN HABIB<br />\nARNAB GOSWAMI<br />\nVINEET JAIN<br />\nAROON PURIE<br />\nPRANNOY JAMES ROY<br />\nN RAM<br />\nRAGHAV BAHL<br />\nJOHN DAYAL<br />\nBARKHA DUTT<br />\nSHEKHAR GUPTA<br />\nSIDHARTH VARADARAJAN<br />\nRAJDEEP SARDESAI<br />\nNAVIKA KUMAR<br />\nRAHUL KANWAL<br />\nNIDHI RAZDAN<br />\nVIKRAM CHANDRA<br />\nFAYE DSOUZA<br />\nRANA AYYUB<br />\nSUDDHENDRA KULKARNI<br />\nVC OF JNU<br />\nPRAKASH KARAT<br />\nDANIEL RAJA<br />\nYECHURY<br />\nBRINDA KARAT<br />\nSIDDHARTH VARADARAJAN<br />\nRAMACHANDRA GUHA<br />\nFALI BABY<br />\nSOLI BABY<br />\nSALVE BABY<br />\nSUHEL SETH<br />\nSHOBHAA DE<br />\nARUNDHATI ROY<br />\nNITI AYOG<br />\nAMITABH KANT<br />\nAUDREY TRUSCHKE<br />\nSHEDON POLLOCK<br />\nWENDY DONIGER<br />\nSPREAD ON SOCIAL MEDIA<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_2b+seedE0f-D\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Swh-fUJBvRQ/UclxdLbO6_I/AAAAAAAAjg4/UjmWO4TfiaQ/s1600/images.jpgkjio.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Swh-fUJBvRQ/UclxdLbO6_I/AAAAAAAAjg4/UjmWO4TfiaQ/s400/images.jpgkjio.jpg\" width=\"290\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To understand Kalidasa , here is a nice joke.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Several centuries ago,\nthe Pope decided in all his wisdom that all the Jews had to leave the\nVatican.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Naturally there was a\nbig uproar from the Jewish community.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So the Pope cut a deal a juicy deal. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He would have a\nreligious debate with any chosen member of the Jewish community. If this Jew\nwon, the Jews could stay. &nbsp;If the Pope won, the Jews would have to leave. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Jews realized that\nthey had no choice.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So they picked an\nelderly aged man named Moishe to represent them.&nbsp; Rabbi Moishe's Latin wasn't very good - in\nfact, he knew very little --- but he was a man of great faith and well\nrespected in the Jewish community. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The pope agreed. What\ncould be easier than a silent debate?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The day of the great\ndebate came. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Moishe and the Pope sat\nopposite each other for a full minute sizing up each other , before the Pope\nraised his hand and showed three fingers.&nbsp;\nMoishe looked back at him and raised one finger. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Pope waved his\nfingers in a circle around his head. Moishe pointed to the ground where he sat.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Pope pulled out a\nwafer and a glass of wine. Moishe pulled out an apple. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Pope stood up and\nsaid, \"I give up. This man is just too good. The Jews can stay.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An hour later, the\ncardinals were all around the Pope asking him what happened. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Pope said:\n\"First I held up three fingers to represent the Trinity.&nbsp; He responded by holding up one finger to\nremind me that there was still one God common to both our religions.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then I waved my finger\naround me to show him that God was all around us.&nbsp; He responded by pointing to the ground and\nshowing that God was also right here with us.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I pulled out the wine\nand the wafer to show that God absolves us from our sins.&nbsp; He pulled out an apple to remind me of\noriginal sin. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He had an instant\nanswer for everything. What could I do?\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meanwhile, the Jewish\ncommunity had crowded around Moishe. \"What happened?\" they asked. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Well,\" said\nMoishe, \"First he said to me that the Jews had three days to get out of\nhere. I told him that not one of us was leaving.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then he told me that\nthis whole city would be cleared of Jews. I let him know that we were staying\nright here.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"And then?\"\nprodded a Jewish woman. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"I don't\nknow,\" said Moishe. \"He took out his effin\u2019 lunch and so I took out\nmine.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><i>Here is the juicy Kalidasa\u2019s\nstory cooked up by the white invader. </i></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kalidasa was an\nimbecile who once sat on a tree branch and cut it with a axe, causing him to\nhave a mighty fall.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The king's daughter was\na very learned lady and said that she will marry him who will defeat her in\n`shaastraartha' (debate on the scriptures). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anyone who gets\ndefeated will be black faced, head shaven and kicked out of country on a\ndonkey. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So, the pundits , who\nhated this vain princess with a sharp tongue, decided to have some fun and took\nthe idiot Kalidasa for the debate. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They however said that\nKalidasa accepts only mute debates.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They sat facing each\nother.&nbsp; The princess showed him one\nfinger, meaning `shakti is one'. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The moron Kalidasa thought\nthat she was threatening to poke him in the eye.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So he showed two\nfingers\u2014meaning that if she pokes in one of his eyes , he would retaliate by\npoking her in both her mangy eyes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She accepted it as\nvalid answer, since `shakti' is manifest in duality (shiv-shakti ). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She showed her the palm\nwith fingers extended like in a slap. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thinking that the\nprincess has upped the ante ( without as much as by your leave ) he showed her\nhis fist. &nbsp;Meaning , bitch , if you slap\nme, I will rearrange your face.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She accepted this too\nas a valid answer.&nbsp; She said `five\nelements' and he said `make the body' (earth, water, fire, air, and void). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So they get married and\non the wedding night she finds out he is a dimwit who does NOT even know what\nto do in bed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So she kicks him out of\nthe house. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He straightaway went to\nKali's temple and cut his tongue at her feet.&nbsp;\nKali was appeased with him and granted him profound wisdom BLAH BLAH.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">A POET LIKE KALIDASA\nDID NOT EXIST IN INDIA IN 6<sup>TH</sup> CENTURY AD , &nbsp;BEFORE THAT OR AFTER THAT..</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rather nobody in India\nknew about Kalidas till Rothschild\u2019s pet poet Goethe went to town praising his\nworks. &nbsp;Max Muller , the employee of\nRothschild who was involved in the creation of Kalidasa out of thin air, later\ngot a bit pissed off by Goethe\u2019s overdrive and remarked that there are better\nworks in Sanskrit in India, gathering dust .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Emperor Vikramaditya of\n7000 BC was kicked back in time by 7600 years to create Kalidasa , the personal\npoet of King Vikramaditya , as one of the 9 gems of his court.&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white man\ninjected poison everywhere that King Vikramaditya personally went to Kalidasa\u2019s\nhouse on his horse to pick him up.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b>It must be known that\nin 7000 BC ,Emperor Vikramaditya of Ujjain ruled from Jerusalem to Urals to\nVietnam.&nbsp; </b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Emperor Bharata before\nhim ruled the whole world , we call as Bharatavarsha. He was the eldest son of\nEmperor Rishaba , whom the Jains consider as the founder of Jainism and the\nfirst Thirtankara.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kalidasa wrote a play\nabout Shakuntala and her son Bharat, and thus converted India ( Bharat ) as a\nvery late entity. &nbsp;After all Dhanwantari\nwas planted as one of the 9 gems . Wikipedia had dated Dhanwantari , as a mere\nmedicant of King Vikramaditya.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While in reality\nDhanwantari the god of Ayurveda came out of the cosmic ocean after Samudra\nManthan, of antiquity.&nbsp; In Kerala every\nAyurvedic doctor pays tribute at the temple of Dhanwantari at Nelluvaya ( 20 km\nfrom Guruvayur temple ) after graduation at the college. This temple existed\neven before Lord Parashurama came to Kerala in 4000 BC.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After Samudra manthan\nhappened the avatar of Vishnu, Dhanwantari rose from the oceans holding in his\n4 hands, a Sudharshan Chakra ( scalar interferometry discus ), a Shankh or\nconch which resonates at 7.83 hertz Schumann resonance,&nbsp; an amrit kalasha ( pot of ambrosia ) , and a\nLEECH.&nbsp; Why leech \u2013 why a worm?&nbsp; Why not something better to accompany the\nother 3 deadly gifts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; This is absolutely wrong. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Emperor &nbsp;Rishabha ( Adinath ) , the father of Chakravatri\nBharata is the founder of Jainism in 8190 BC, and is the first Thirthankara.&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rishabha\nis mentioned in the Hindu text of the Bhagavata Purana , Vaishnava / Shaiva\nPura\u0146as, and several other ancient texts. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The great&nbsp;\nscholar Dr. S. Radhakrishnan, ex-president of IndianUnion, had written,\n\"Jain tradition ascribes the origin of the system to Rishabhadeva, the\nfirst Tirthankara. The Yajurveda and Bhagawata Purana mentions the name of\nRishabha \"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>The white historian has\nput Mahavira as a contemporary of Buddha at 599 BC. This is wrong . &nbsp;First of\nall Mahavira was just a reformer. &nbsp;He was the 24<sup>th</sup> Thirtankara . &nbsp;And he was born in 4500 BC. &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mahavira fasted to death ( salekhana) at\nPavapure (near modern Patna).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white historian even\nmistakes Mahavira statue for Buddha. &nbsp;Mahavira\nis always shown naked , while Buddha is always fully clothed.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
