font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">The results astounded the CIA officials as it stood at\n26450 BC.&nbsp;</span>and this got the CIA director John McCone involved personally. &nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After all his bible said the Big Bang happened\nin 4004 BC. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">None of the known\nancient excavated civilizations of world history \u2013 Egyptian, Mesopotamian </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">existed before 8000 years ago.</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The old pre-Rigvedic\nSanskrit manuscript was translated by the CIA with great difficulty, with some Indians involved.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The manuscript mentioned the name of the\nidol \u2013 \u201ckalpa maha-ayusham rasayana vigraha\u201d abbreviated in CIA files to \u201cKalpa\nVigraha.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was told by the monk\nthat this idol if placed in water inside a copper vessel for nine days , would charge the water . If\nthis water is drunk humans will have very long life. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The \u201ccharged\u201d water was thus sent to various US laboratories under heavy security and all reports and\ndocuments received from the labs were sent directly to the CIA director, John\nMcCone.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There was a huge hunt\nfor ancient Sanskrit Homeopathy and Ayurveda literature from India.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">We in India know that Rothschild\u2019s\npersonal doctor, the German Jew Dr Friedrich Samuel Hahnemann, was converted to\n\u201cthe father of Homeopathy\u201d ( sic ). </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 16px;\"><b><i><span style=\"color: red;\">Below: Friedrich Samuel Hahnemann</span></i></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-MYn5Ei6G7rM/UaQpYsiV0ZI/AAAAAAAAiyA/I29DWJ7II5I/s1600/Hahnemann.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-MYn5Ei6G7rM/UaQpYsiV0ZI/AAAAAAAAiyA/I29DWJ7II5I/s1600/Hahnemann.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Homeopathy in India is more than 6000 years\nold. The fact that water holds memory is written in our vedic texts .</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">What\nthe hell is \u201ctirtham\u201d and holy water in a Maharishi's copper lota?</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A nine-member team\ncoded as \u201cthe watering team \u201c consisting mostly of women was formed whose sole\ntask was to feed this water to unsuspecting citizens in the US.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The \u201cwatering\u201d had to\nbe done without the subjects\u2019 knowledge by befriending them or by looking for\ninnocuous opportunities to get them to consume a glass of water for three\nconsecutive days in a row. &nbsp;This went on\nfor a few months. &nbsp;Some of the human test\nsubjects chosen were in far-flung states and in remote towns and cities of the\nUnited States. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-0fLav6dSfZo/UaRm2BNeOwI/AAAAAAAAi28/ZcMH8qMuv24/s1600/images.jpgOHBIR.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-0fLav6dSfZo/UaRm2BNeOwI/AAAAAAAAi28/ZcMH8qMuv24/s1600/images.jpgOHBIR.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Apparently the CIA had\nsome system in place to monitor their subjects for whatever results they\nexpected as an outcome of the experiment for the \u201cWatering Team\u201d was not\nrequired to hang around once the subject had consumed the water over three\ndays. &nbsp;\u201cEase-out of the acquaintance\nwithout raising any questions\u201d, they were told.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A recent long-distant\ntelephone call from another state in the US on the morning of December 2008\nchanged all that. The source, now long retired, with great-grandchildren\nplaying around him, was unexpectedly informed one night by another retired agent\nof the CIA ( who was watching American Idol on TV ) that the Kalpa Vigraha was\n\u201cmissing\u201d. &nbsp;The agent who made the call\nwas once a member of the \u201cinner circle\u201d, a man who knew what the experiments\nconducted in the early 1960s was all about.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-WuiSQp-HjzM/UaRmljLZSyI/AAAAAAAAi2s/Lk2AtIx-emI/s1600/ATgAAAATMnTCMfQxjKNTDau0_z-NhDsP8qcUfv2eP0msurbMneiU_VwjWDJJp50qBQL_gxc5NSVMO4tEADjXHWkSa1EgAJtU9VDUWOib9ZaJ3-1rQyw33hr2hq1yVg.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-WuiSQp-HjzM/UaRmljLZSyI/AAAAAAAAi2s/Lk2AtIx-emI/s400/ATgAAAATMnTCMfQxjKNTDau0_z-NhDsP8qcUfv2eP0msurbMneiU_VwjWDJJp50qBQL_gxc5NSVMO4tEADjXHWkSa1EgAJtU9VDUWOib9ZaJ3-1rQyw33hr2hq1yVg.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"295\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cThe Hindu idol, my\ndear Mac (name changed), don\u2019t you remember, the one they called the Kalpa\nVigraha?\u201d the voice said. &nbsp;\u201cDon\u2019t you\nremember the experiments that put you in charge of the Watering Team\nassignment? &nbsp;I\u2019m only calling you this\nmorning because I knew for certain that you would be alive and well to hear\nthis news.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ken, (name changed ) the inner-circle\nCIA agent reminded Mac of the many subjects the CIA had targeted for\nconsumption of the \u201ccharged\u201d Kalpa Vigraha water back in 1960-61, many of whom\nhad been fed the water personally by Mac. Mac could recall many of the names\nand even crossed-checked in his own diary to confirm and refresh his memory of\nall the people he had surreptitiously befriended to feed the \u201ccharged\u201d water.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A week later Ken and\nMac met to discuss the matter. They went over the list in Mac\u2019s old diary, and\nfor the first time in decades, recalled the events of more than 45 years ago. .\nThe CIA had been keeping a meticulous watch (\u201ckalpa-tag\u201d, they called it) over\nalmost all test-subjects around the globe, and monitoring their lives in\nsecrecy.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/--wdXUHLDMaI/UaRmtz3ag4I/AAAAAAAAi20/k6H3Nug7hec/s1600/55062-temples-vishnu-lakshmi-statues-indiaimages-1600x1067.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/--wdXUHLDMaI/UaRmtz3ag4I/AAAAAAAAi20/k6H3Nug7hec/s400/55062-temples-vishnu-lakshmi-statues-indiaimages-1600x1067.jpg\" height=\"347\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All persons subjected to the\nKalpa Vigraha experiment were expected to live very long lives, past the age of\n110 at least. &nbsp;The entire lot in the\ndiary had lived beyond 110, some even to 120,&nbsp;\nexcept four names, that of Ruth Golonka, Willie Lee Morgan, Steven\nMartin and Bert Jenkins were found to be of people who had died \u201caccidentally\u201d.\n&nbsp;Ruth Golonka, died of a car accident,\nWillie Lee Morgan was murdered. Both Steven Martin and Bert Jenkins had died in\nVietnam.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An audit conducted in\n1996 revealed that the heavy metal-lined chest was very much in the store, but\nthat the idol and the manuscript had been \u201cmisplaced\u201d. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In a search conducted\nover many weeks, spanning many states, and enquiries made from many retired\npersonnel, the agency was able to trace the manuscript from the house of a\nmicrobiologist the CIA had many years ago hired for analysis of the \u201ccharged\u201d\nkalpa vigraha water. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-aig2HlDT09Q/UaRm86Kp-PI/AAAAAAAAi3E/RZskD4iprMU/s1600/B70S5_Q3666.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-aig2HlDT09Q/UaRm86Kp-PI/AAAAAAAAi3E/RZskD4iprMU/s400/B70S5_Q3666.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"315\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The manuscript was\nfound but the whereabouts of the Kalpa Vigraha is still a mystery. Following\nthe discovery of the manuscript, a spate of mysterious deaths of\nmicrobiologists followed. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">After nearly half a\ncentury, photographs of the Kalpa Vigraha, depicting the idol from four\ndifferent directions were circulated around the world by the CIA with an\nenormous cash reward for its recovery.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is how the world knows about this. </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Do you think this will ever happen to\nChristianity or Judaism?</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sudarshana Chakra is usually\nportrayed on the right rear hand of the four hands of Vishnu, who also holds a\nShankha (a conch shell) in his left fore hand, a Gada (mace) in his left rear\nhand, and a Padma (lotus bud) in his right fore hand.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-gtWbPX-x9Aw/UaQvws_dijI/AAAAAAAAiyQ/HJGTNHvWMuk/s1600/images.jpgjhgt.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-gtWbPX-x9Aw/UaQvws_dijI/AAAAAAAAiyQ/HJGTNHvWMuk/s400/images.jpgjhgt.jpg\" height=\"400\" width=\"317\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sudarshana Chakra was\ngiven to Lord Vishnu by Lord Shiva who was pleased with Vishnu's devotion.\nVishnu who was having a torrid time as preserver god , in controlling the evil\nasuras , went to Mount Kailasa and began to pray to Shiva. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today you require a\nChinese visa to visit Mount Kailash. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vishnu chanted many\nmantras, but there was no sign of Shiva. &nbsp;Shiva has a thousand names and Vishnu next\nstarted to chant these names. &nbsp;Each day\nhe chanted the thousand names and offered a thousand lotus flowers to Shiva. &nbsp;Shiva decided to litmus test Vishnu. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One day, he stole a single\nlotus flower from the thousand that were to be offered. &nbsp;When Vishnu realized that there was one lotus\nflower less, he gouged out his own eye and offered it in place of the missing\nlotus flower. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shiva was now pleased\nand appeared before Vishnu and presented him with the Sudarshana Chakra. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The idol with CIA shows the sudarshana chakra\nstatic , held low and it depicts Lord Vishnu after receiving the weapon.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The use of the\nSudarshana Chakra is occasionally mentioned in the Hindu texts of Rigveda,\nYajurveda and Puranas, as an ultimate weapon to eliminate the enemy of law,\norder and preservation.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-cBJYpujA62g/UaQya4oeRiI/AAAAAAAAizE/A9znzMf1jPY/s1600/download.jpgliuglg.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-cBJYpujA62g/UaQya4oeRiI/AAAAAAAAizE/A9znzMf1jPY/s400/download.jpgliuglg.jpg\" height=\"280\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During the Mahabharata\nwar 4000 BC,&nbsp; Arjuna had sworn to kill\nJayadratha before sunset failing which he will commit suicide. &nbsp;The Kaurava army was successful in keeping\nArjuna away from Jayadratha and sunset was nearing.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-DduC2Bsitxs/UaQz8BzisDI/AAAAAAAAizU/sIvm6ky8pOw/s1600/krishna_arjuna_Mahabharata-Kurukshetra3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-DduC2Bsitxs/UaQz8BzisDI/AAAAAAAAizU/sIvm6ky8pOw/s400/krishna_arjuna_Mahabharata-Kurukshetra3.jpg\" height=\"300\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So Lord Krishna (\navatar of Vishnu ) unleashed his Sudarshana Chakra in scalar interferometry mode\n, which created an severe inversion in the atmosphere.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-wVOA8K1_h6Y/UaQxntqbbqI/AAAAAAAAiyo/WEYCB_sYEH8/s1600/imagesCAHUOVJ9.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-wVOA8K1_h6Y/UaQxntqbbqI/AAAAAAAAiyo/WEYCB_sYEH8/s200/imagesCAHUOVJ9.jpg\" height=\"200\" width=\"158\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The atmospheric\nrefraction reversed , and the sun suddenly dipped below the visible horizon\ncausing absolute darkness. &nbsp;At this time\nthere was a mighty cheer among the Kaurava ranks and Jayadratha peered out of\nhis tent in triumph and relief.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As per the rules of\nDharma Yuddha it is NOT possible to kill an enemy after sunset. &nbsp;As soon as\nKrishna saw Jayadratha he commanded Arjuna to behead him with an arrow and\nimmediately restored the atmospheric refraction the usual way. &nbsp;The sun suddenly\ncame up above the visible horizon.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-qfsjXVuMEr8/UaQxgo5tQnI/AAAAAAAAiyg/yAoThuLWPUs/s1600/upside_down_rainbow.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-qfsjXVuMEr8/UaQxgo5tQnI/AAAAAAAAiyg/yAoThuLWPUs/s1600/upside_down_rainbow.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><i>Above reverse rainbow\n--due to inversion.</i></span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0-w7vyNL1tI/UaQx2cQh2QI/AAAAAAAAiy4/gR-cG75wHEE/s1600/VDEERT.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0-w7vyNL1tI/UaQx2cQh2QI/AAAAAAAAiy4/gR-cG75wHEE/s1600/VDEERT.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This was NOT a solar\neclipse. &nbsp;And hence a solar eclipse\nshould NOT be used to date the Mahabharata war of 4000 BC.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sudarshana Chakra was created\nby the combined energy of Brahma, Vishnu and Mahesh. &nbsp;It is a spinning disc with 108 serrations . &nbsp;This weapon is mind controlled and personalized.\n&nbsp;It can be activated only by a mantra\nknown to the owner. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only scalar\nelectromagnetic interferometry works at the level of the mind . The mind is of\nthe time domain-- it is \"time-like,\" &nbsp;and is a scalar electromagnetic manifestation.\n&nbsp;It can lock on to any other scalar\nphenomena, and be influenced by them. &nbsp;The\ninternal longitudinal wave in the electromagnetic wave is the fundamental wave\nand exists in all known electromagnetic fields of any shape. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-622FZtvhiI8/UaRmI5TR-MI/AAAAAAAAi2M/fYX46S2qg74/s1600/imagesCAPCM9SA.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-622FZtvhiI8/UaRmI5TR-MI/AAAAAAAAi2M/fYX46S2qg74/s400/imagesCAPCM9SA.jpg\" height=\"284\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The scalar component of\nthe electromagnetic wave can be created from two opposing electromagnetic\nwaves, a wave and its anti wave. &nbsp;Both\nwaves will cancel each other\u2019s electrical and magnetic field components when\nthe waves are in phase spatially but 180 degrees out of phase temporally . The\nresult is an electromagnetic scalar wave.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once released the Sudarshan\nChakra assumes a conscious form and&nbsp;\nfollows the mind command of the owner. &nbsp;&nbsp;This\nhas search and destroy, &nbsp;stealth (\ninvisible ) and loiter capability. &nbsp;It\nthe scalar &nbsp;interferometry mode this\nweapon becomes terribly destructive and its laser travels faster than light. &nbsp;Nikola Tesla was introduced to this weapon by\nSwami Vivekananda. &nbsp;&nbsp;As a spinning howitzer it operates in the\nexhothermic and endothermic mode. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-M8bkJfs6WX8/UaRmQOKxcxI/AAAAAAAAi2U/A-qPdWlv0XQ/s1600/imagesCAZ7QVEP.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-M8bkJfs6WX8/UaRmQOKxcxI/AAAAAAAAi2U/A-qPdWlv0XQ/s400/imagesCAZ7QVEP.jpg\" height=\"309\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In\n\"endothermic\" mode, the howitzer sucks energy out of the target area,\nessentially creating a blast of cold at the distant target. &nbsp;It is even capable of freezing parts of the\nocean and having temperature inversions in the atmosphere.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">By using both of these\nhot (exothermic) and cold (endothermic) modes together the weather can be\naltered anywhere. Warm the air over here, cool it down over there, put a curl\nin the jet stream, dissipate clouds, create clouds, whip up a tornado.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-VsEJHwjHanI/UaRmXPoa_wI/AAAAAAAAi2c/dPpgkWR6B1w/s1600/imagesCAT0DI85.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-VsEJHwjHanI/UaRmXPoa_wI/AAAAAAAAi2c/dPpgkWR6B1w/s320/imagesCAT0DI85.jpg\" height=\"239\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In exothermic mode it\ncan fry anything selectively. &nbsp;Matter is\nnot a condensed substance but a diffused form of energy. &nbsp;Every living cell in the body is killed\ninstantly, including all bacteria, germs, etc. &nbsp;Anybody hit with this thing falls like a limp\nrag and lies where it falls. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the\n\"exothermic\" mode of operation immense EM energy blasts outward at\nthe target site. If you apply this technology today the howitzer can use a\nlesser exothermic power setting and simply destroy all electronics in the\ntarget area.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-bQV-cyvILFk/UaRmdlpxfkI/AAAAAAAAi2k/MicHQwViBPk/s1600/220px-Chakra_ayudhapurusha.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-bQV-cyvILFk/UaRmdlpxfkI/AAAAAAAAi2k/MicHQwViBPk/s1600/220px-Chakra_ayudhapurusha.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thus they can render\nnuclear missiles inoperable as they sit in their silos by \"frying\"\nthe electronic circuits that guide them. They can bring down any airplane,\nanywhere in the world, at any time. Any person anywhere, if their exact position\nis known, can be assassinated without a shot being fired.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It doesn't\ndecay for months. &nbsp;In a macabre fashion,\nit's reduced to something like food irradiated with nuclear radiation;\neverything is killed, so the material is preserved for an extended period\nbefore any decay can set in.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-tK2yAThFmd8/UaQ4pS2r2UI/AAAAAAAAizk/kATy6fSzRhg/s1600/images.jpghiutvk.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A collision between a\nparticle and its antiparticle converts both into a burst of electromagnetic\nradiation. &nbsp;Curved space time tells\nmass-energy how to move; mass-energy tells space time how to curve.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Contrast this with\nNewton's petty view of the mechanics of the heavens: Force tells mass how to\naccelerate; mass tells gravity how to exert force.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gravity can\u2019t be shielded. &nbsp;ZPF also cannot be\nshielded.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the frightening\n\"Mindsnapper\" or psychotronic mode, it affects the electromagnetic\nmind-body connection. Being mind-snapped at a low level would cause you to lose\nconsciousness. Being mind-snapped at a slightly higher power would\n\"entrain\" all minds in the target area into a kind of hypnogogic\ntrance, a state in which they would all be highly susceptible to suggestions\nand orders.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-GnCgX5ZjM1c/UaRnZj7WpDI/AAAAAAAAi3U/PhalqFDvoXw/s1600/p.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-GnCgX5ZjM1c/UaRnZj7WpDI/AAAAAAAAi3U/PhalqFDvoXw/s1600/p.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bliss or psychic hell\nat the flip of a switch applied today it is the Quantum Potential Weapon. It\ncan be used to \"broadcast\" even physical disease over a wide populace\nwithout the need of the infectious organism itself. Don\u2019t even think that\nAIDS,&nbsp; SARS , Flu viruses without DNA are\nall protein scientist matter.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is to the credit of\nthe Vishnu, that he never used Sudarshan Chakra weapon to its full potential,\neven when provoked.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; You are the the supreme transcendental\nprowess in the hands of the Supreme Personality of Godhead. &nbsp;You are the\noriginal vision of the Lord, and therefore you are known as Sudar\u015bana. &nbsp;Everything has been created by your activities, and therefore you are\nall-pervading.\"</span></b></i><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;</span></b>&nbsp;</span><b style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">(S Bhagawatam &nbsp;9.5.5)- &nbsp;5000 BC</b></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>chakram\nyugantanala-tigma-nemi <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>bhramat samantad\nbhagavat-prayuktam <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>dandagdhi dandagdhy\nari-sainyam ashu <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>kaksham yatha\nvata-sakho hutashaha</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Set into motion by the\nSupreme Personality of Godhead and wandering in all the four directions, the\nSudarsana disc of the Supreme Lord has sharp edges as destructive as the fire\nof devastation at the end of the millennium. As a blazing fire burns dry grass\nto ashes with the assistance of the breeze, may the Sudarshana chakra burn our\nenemies to ashes.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Lord Krishna\nlifted the Govardhan mountain with the levitation power of Sudarshana Chakra\nwhich sliced the mountain and held it high.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-YbWyaZRQ8pk/UaRVcldzaVI/AAAAAAAAi0c/XiSmR4QLcyQ/s1600/YVOIT.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-YbWyaZRQ8pk/UaRVcldzaVI/AAAAAAAAi0c/XiSmR4QLcyQ/s400/YVOIT.jpg\" height=\"302\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Krishna defeated\nIndra, the deity of thunder and rain. As per legend, Krishna saw huge\npreparations for the annual offering to Indra and questions his father Nanda\nabout it. He debated with the villagers about what their 'dharma' truly was.\nThey were farmers, they should do their duty and concentrate on farming and\nprotection of their cattle.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He continued to say that all human beings should\nmerely do their 'karma', to the best of their ability and not pray or conduct\nsacrifices for natural phenomenon. The villagers were convinced by Krishna, and\ndid not proceed with the special puja (prayer).&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-FMjb1C4hzgI/UaRVYe87qII/AAAAAAAAi0U/uOFCgwFlwrY/s1600/images.jpgLJHUIT.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-FMjb1C4hzgI/UaRVYe87qII/AAAAAAAAi0U/uOFCgwFlwrY/s400/images.jpgLJHUIT.jpg\" height=\"272\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indra was then angered, and flooded the village. Krishna then lifted\nMounaint Govardhan and held it up as protection to his people and cattle from\nthe rain.&nbsp; Indra finally accepted defeat\nand recognized Krishna as supreme.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Marco Polo came to\nMalabar ( Kerala ) in 1293, and has made records of Siddha alchemy.&nbsp; He records a meeting he had with a group of\n\u201dyogi alchemists\u201d&nbsp; who, by preparing a\npotion a lifespan of&nbsp; 150-200\nyears\u201d.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There he came across a\nsmall monkey seated on a hill and saying Rama Rama repeatedly.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cO! Monkey, who are you\nand what is your name?\u201d, Arjuna asked.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cI am Hanuman, servitor\nof Lord Rama. &nbsp;I constructed the massive\nstone bridge over the ocean here for the Lord, long ago \u201d, &nbsp;Hanuman replied in self introduction.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cWhy did you need to\ntoil so hard . Any worthy warrior can construct a bridge across the ocean with\nhis arrows quite easily. &nbsp;&nbsp;Lord Rama could have done that with his\narrows. &nbsp;His effort in building a stone\nbridge was an exercise in futility.\u201d &nbsp;Arjuna\nreplied with lot of pride.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cThe arrow-bridge does\nnot have the strength to take the tremendous load of monkeys like us. &nbsp;This is the reason why Lord Rama did not\nconsider building an arrow-bridge\u201d, &nbsp;Hanuman\nreplied immediately.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cI will show you how to\nbuild a strong bridge where all you monkeys can jump around.&nbsp; This requires knowledge and power. Watch how\nI create a magnificent arrow bridge from India to Lanka\u201d, Arjuna said.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hanuman smirked \u201cWell,\nyour so-called arrow-bridge cannot take the load of even my thumb. &nbsp;It will collapse. Then, What are you gonna\ndo?\u201d, asked Hanuman.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cI will enter into\nblazing fire and give up my life if my arrow-bridge collapses under your\nweight\u201d, Arjuna promised. \u201cNow you also couner offer something.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cIf your arrow-bridge\nis not destroyed by the touch of my finger then I will remain ever present in\nyour flag and keep on serving you\u201d, Hanuman replied.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-b7NZv7bcwTU/UaRiRIehjzI/AAAAAAAAi18/IlsUa3NSCas/s1600/images.jpgihb;.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-b7NZv7bcwTU/UaRiRIehjzI/AAAAAAAAi18/IlsUa3NSCas/s400/images.jpgihb;.jpg\" height=\"286\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<o:p></o:p><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Arjuna took the famous\nbow ( gaandiva ) and in a jiffy created a strong and magnificent bridge over\nthe ocean with his arrows.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cNow you jump and play\non the bridge as you please.\u201d, Arjun challenged Hanuman.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hanuman smiled and just\nkept his thumb on the bridge. &nbsp;Suddenly\nthere was loud creaking sound. &nbsp;The\nbridge collapsed suddenly. &nbsp;It got\nsubmerged in the womb of the ocean. Arjuna was crestfallen. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His pride vanished into\nthin air. He prepared a blazing fire to give up his life although Hanuman\ndissuaded him from such an extreme step.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A passerby saint saw\nthe fire and learnt what all had transpired. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cYour mutual promises\nare invalid as there was no witness. Now youhave to &nbsp;repeat it before me\u201d, the sage said. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Arjuna once again\ncreated the magnificent arrow bridge. Hanuman pressed his thumb. But the bridge\ndid not collapse. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hanuman understood that\nhis Lord Rama has kept his \u2018sudarshan chakra\u2019 below the bridge to save Arjuna. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">IT IS THE INTERNET AGE\u2014<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;
