, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Brits after failing\nto push mortal Buddha as the 9</span><sup style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\">th</sup><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"> avatar of Vishnu, tried to push\nLord Jagganath in place.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let this endless academic debate end.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\"><b>Lord Jagannath is Lord\nNarasimha \u2013 period !!</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The head of the\nJagannath image makes sense when perceived as a lion's head, where the emphasis\nis on the jaws, rather than as a human head. &nbsp;The icon of Jagannath is a carved and\ndecorated wooden stump with large round eyes and with stumps as hands, with the\nconspicuous absence of any legs. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Wu7CP69J8v4/UZr-Jn-NLtI/AAAAAAAAilQ/JU2CypOwYsA/s1600/200px-Jagannath_2_-_Sanctum_Sanctorum_-_Puri_Jagannath_Temple.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Wu7CP69J8v4/UZr-Jn-NLtI/AAAAAAAAilQ/JU2CypOwYsA/s1600/200px-Jagannath_2_-_Sanctum_Sanctorum_-_Puri_Jagannath_Temple.png\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Neem\nwood is chosen because as per the Bhavishya Purana it is the most auspicious\nwood to make idols of Vishnu, and this is where the answer lies.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Puri has always been a &nbsp;recognized Vaisnavite centre of India. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are 105 Narasimha\ntemples with land endowments in Orissa.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">You can find a dozen Narasimha temples in Puri city, with many more in the Hindu mutts of Adi Shankaracharya. &nbsp;Adi Shankaracharya &nbsp;established Gobardhana/Bhavavardhana Math at\nPuri in 2000 BC.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ramanuja followed Adisankaracharya in establishing mutts in\nconsiderable number, where they worship Narasimha.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Mookambika temple of\nKollur has Narasimha on the golden spires.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-O-Q3_25bJNo/UZsCo6TEepI/AAAAAAAAilo/DTbj3LEvfI8/s1600/images.jpgJHLKBG.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-O-Q3_25bJNo/UZsCo6TEepI/AAAAAAAAilo/DTbj3LEvfI8/s400/images.jpgJHLKBG.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mutts of Madhavacharya order worship\nLord Narasimha. Sri Chaitanya advised his disciples to have Danda Pranama &nbsp;(salutation by laying on the ground) to Lord\nNarasimha before taking darshan of Sri Jagannath. &nbsp;Sri Chaitanya Himself worshipped Lord\nNarasimha at third step of baisapahach, before going to have the darshan of Sri\nJagannath. Mutts of Ramananda order do Narasimha worship.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mutts worship Narasimha\n&nbsp;in iconic form or aniconic form. The\naniconic form is even as Salagrama stone on which the face of Lord Narasimha is\ndrawn. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jagannatha is\nworshipped as Narasimha on the 14th day of lunar fortnight of the month of Vaishakha\n(Narasimha Chaturdasi). &nbsp;Angyamala\n(garland) of the Lord is taken on this day to Chakra Narasimha for his birthday\ncelebration. &nbsp;The birthday celebration of\nNarasimha is celebrated at the temple of Narasimha, near Muktimandap.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Narasimha is\ndescribed as the protector &nbsp;of\nNandighosha chariot. &nbsp;It is customary\nthat a wooden image of Narasimha after due ritual ( rathpratistha ), completed\nby the deula-purohit, the only strotriya Brahmin servitor of the temple, is to\nbe brought with proper procession with bijekahali and other vadyas to the\nchariots.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><b>The clump feet of Lord Jagannath\nis significant because of Lord Narasimha's sudden appearance from the pillar.</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>This I hope will be the\nlast nail on the coffin of endless debates instigated by the white Christian historian , as to who Lord Jagannath is.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><i>Now to the story--</i></span></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to Bhagavata\nPurana, &nbsp;Hiranyakashipu and Hiranyaksha were\ngatekeepers of Vishnu\u2019s palace.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During\nthe Satya Yuga, Maharishi Kashyap and his wife Diti had two sons \u2013 Hiranyaksha\nand Hiranyakasipu.&nbsp;&nbsp; It is said that\nasuras were born to them as a result of their union at the time of dusk, which\nwas said to be an inauspicious time for such a sexual act.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You will find the\nKashyapa name&nbsp; in other Hindu texts\nforward in time\u2014these belong to the descendants of Kashyapa.. .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The birthplace of\nHiranyakashipu is Moolsthan ( present-day Multan in Pakistan ). &nbsp;The magnificient Narasimha temple there was\ndestroyed by the Paki mullahs after Independence. &nbsp;They aroused the base passions of Muslim villagers\noff Suraj Kund and burnt the temple. &nbsp;</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">The\npopulation of Suraj Kund was fully Hindu due to this Narasimha temple .&nbsp; Bundu Das, the caretaker of the temple,\nescaped with the Narasimha idol. &nbsp;Before\nindependence Hindus from all over India used to take a dip in the pool where\nNarasimha took bath after killing Hiranyakashipu. <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Multan was known as the\ncity of gold for its large and wealthy temples. The Sun temple, Suraj Mandir, which\nwas destroyed after Independence was considered one of the largest and\nwealthiest temples in the entire sub-continent.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hiranyaksha kept\ntroubling both humans and the Devas alike. The humans and the Devas unable to bear\nthis any more prayed to preserver god Lord Vishnu to protect them. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Vishnu assumed his\n3<sup>rd</sup> avatar &nbsp;as a Boar ( Varaha\n) and killed Hiranyaksha.\u2014 but he left some unfinished business.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the death of his\nbrother Hiranyaksha at the hands of Lord Vishnu , Hiranyakasipu was furious\nwith both the humans and the Devas. &nbsp;He led\nhis army of asuras to attack them. &nbsp;Hiranyakasipu\ncame to know that every time, Lord Vishnu helped the Devas to fight him back.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Asura King\nHiranyakashipu sought the advise of his guru Maharishi Shukracharya.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shukracharya the son of\nBhrigu Rishi was on the side of the Asuras and was training them. Shukracharya\nhad a point to prove to the Devas who had spurned him when he offered to be\ntheir guru and mentor. They chose Sage Brihaspati son of Maharishi Angira\ninstead. Brihaspati is known in other cultures as Zeus&nbsp; or Thor.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He advised him to do\nsevere penance to appease Lord Brahma and then ask for a boon of immortality .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hiranyakasipu started\nhis severe austerities and soon forgot all about himself and his kingdom....<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-QjfnpyuIc8E/UZsfHChOYXI/AAAAAAAAil4/lMvrHmxaaPM/s1600/Austerity.jpgNRD.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-QjfnpyuIc8E/UZsfHChOYXI/AAAAAAAAil4/lMvrHmxaaPM/s320/Austerity.jpgNRD.jpg\" width=\"233\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For many years he stood\nstill with his hands raised towards the shy on Mount Mandara, and even though\nant hills, grass, and plants grew on his body, he would not stir. Wild insects\nburrowed in his body and his flesh was covered with maggots . His bones stood exposed.\n&nbsp;Ant hills formed around his boy and\ntermites bit him. &nbsp;Still he continued his\ntapasya.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meanwhile Lord Indra\nthe King of the Devas came to know that Hiranyakasipu was not leading his men. &nbsp;He realized that if he acted decisively now,\nhe would be able to exterminate the Asuras and cut their strength for ever.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indra along with other\nDevas attacked the kingdom of the Asuras.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just as Lord Indra had perceived\n, without the leadership of Hiranyakasipu, the Asuras were no match for the devas. The Asuras lost the war. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Indra\ndrove away the Asuras.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After destroying\nHiranyakasipu's capital, &nbsp;Lord Indra and\nparty marched into Hiranyakasipu's palace. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There he found\nHiranyakasipu's pregnant wife Kayadhu. &nbsp;Indra\nthen though of using her as a future hostage , in case Hiranyakasipu broke his\ntapasya and came back full of vengeance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At that time that Sage\nNarada appeared before Indra. He flew into a uncharacteristic rage and warned\nhim NOT to do what he had in mind. &nbsp;He\ndeclared that Hiranyakashipu\u2019s wife is not a sinner and if she is harmed Indra\nwould pay for it. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indra looked at the\nangry sage who had his own powers , realised that he had no choice other than\nto let Kayadu go. &nbsp;Indra and his men went\naway leaving a crying and pregnant Kayadu in the midst of the ruined and\nburning capital.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sage Narada consoled\nhere and asked if she knew of a place where she could be safe with well\nwishers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kayadu looked around\nher and was fraid that after Narada left, Indra would come back with his men.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She pleaded that Narada\nshould take care of her in his ashram.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Narada smiled. This was\nthe reason Narada had come here \u2013 to take Kayadu to his home.. The divine foretelling\nwould come true, things had started..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kayadu accompanied Sage\nNarada to his home and there Kayadu served the sage well. &nbsp;Sage Narada found Kayadu to be fast on the\nuptake and very intelligent. &nbsp;So in In\nthe evenings, Sage Narada would relax and tell Kayadu stories of Lord\nVishnu....Hearing all this Kayadu developed a profound sense of attachment\ntowards Lord Vishnu. &nbsp;Prahalada was a tiny fetus in her womb.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In her womb, the young\nunborn baby also heard these stories and also loved Lord Vishnu. The time\npassed happily there...<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Prahlada was</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">born in Narada's ashram Devatas showered\nflowers on the cottage from the sky.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Brahma and the\nother Devas were meanwhile having a very huge problem. &nbsp;The air of the heavens were becoming hotter\nand hotter and the Devas were finding it difficult to sleep .The Devas realized\nthat Hiranyakasipu's penance was becoming so powerful that he was disturbing\nthe environment and the heavens were burning up.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-jK_jvkqFN3w/UZtPlpMhtvI/AAAAAAAAiog/YYLXw_9Sr24/s1600/images.jpgh4u4rjur.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"239\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-jK_jvkqFN3w/UZtPlpMhtvI/AAAAAAAAiog/YYLXw_9Sr24/s320/images.jpgh4u4rjur.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unable to take it anymore,\nthe Devas ran to Lord Brahma. &nbsp;Lord\nBrahma agreed to meet Hiranyakasipu and went to earth to meet the Asura. &nbsp;He found him standing with his hands raised , entwined\nin creepers and vines , his body infested with maggots with a large part of his skull and skeleton exposed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Brahma was touched\nwith the devotion of Hiranyakasipu. &nbsp;He\ntook some water from his Kamandalam and sprinkled it on Hiranyakasipu. &nbsp;Suddenly Hiranyakasipu woke up from his\ntrance.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the water fell on\nHiranyakasipu, he emerged from the creepers new and fresh. The wounds healed like\nmagic. He looked at the God of Creation and fell on his feet.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Brahma looked at\nHiranyakasipu touched, 'Arise son! Your penance is unparalleled! You can have\nany boon you wish!'<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hiranyakasipu bowed and\nsaid, 'My Lord! I wish to be immortal...'<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Brahma looked\nunhappy as he shook his head, 'Son, all who are born have to die. I cannot\nchange the laws of nature. Please ask for anything else, and I will grant it to\nyou ...'<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hiranyakasipu had been\ntutored by Sage Shukracharya.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">He bowed to Lord\nBrahma. 'Lord, I wish for an alternate boon...'</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Brahma gestured\nfor Hiranyakasipu to continue. &nbsp;Hiranyaksipu\nspoke in clear tones,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">'Lord I wish that I\ncannot be killed by any man, God or animal or any other creature created by\nyou. Nobody should be able to kill me at day or night, in heavens or in earth,\nin the day or the night either inside the house or outside the house, or with\nany weapons...'<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Lord Brahma heard\nthis he stayed still for some time. He knew that granting this boon was not\ngood considering that Hiranyakasipu had shown utter contempt for all other\nlives. But he also knew that he had no choice. He had to grant whatever was\nasked of him and he could NOT afford to allow this asura to continue with more\nsevere tapasya.. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brahma in a bind, said tersely\n\"So be it !! \" (&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Tatha asthu</i> )</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Saying thus Lord Brahma limped away with a heavy heart. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hiranyakasipu\noverjoyed with the wrangled boon ran back to his kingdom. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">He ran back skippety\nskip crying </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cI have become invincible; I\nhave become immortal!\u201d</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-gCDG7SOSGk0/UZtPfZvpcnI/AAAAAAAAioY/QonVinErkrw/s1600/images.jpgjkytdjnjr.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-gCDG7SOSGk0/UZtPfZvpcnI/AAAAAAAAioY/QonVinErkrw/s400/images.jpgjkytdjnjr.jpg\" width=\"266\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was grieved to see\nhis ruined capital , massacred citizens and wife missing.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was filled with a\nfeeling of revenge.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hiranyakasipu attacked\nIndra. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indra had no chance. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Devas were driven out of Devaloka.\nHiranyakasipu became the ruler of the Heavens.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hiranyakasipu found his\nwife Kayadu and brought back his wife home.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Despite Kayadu asking\nHiranyakasipu to change his ways, Hiranyakasipu continued tormented the humans\nand the Devas alike, but no one was able to raise a voice against him.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As Prahlada was growing\nup, Hiranyakasipu became more and more powerful and he started committing more\nand more atrocities.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He decreed that\neveryone in his kingdom must worship him alone. Nobody could worship the Lord\nin any form. &nbsp;In all temples to the Lord,\na &nbsp;statue or a picture of Hiranyakashipu\nreplaced the idols. &nbsp;His soldiers were to\ncheck that everybody obeyed the decree, and offenders were tortured and &nbsp;killed. &nbsp;Terror spread like wild fire throughout the\nkingdom.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-N7Xhu-uz9oU/UZtPa8H-vsI/AAAAAAAAioQ/GHYswFjSOx0/s1600/images.jpgenxbm.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-N7Xhu-uz9oU/UZtPa8H-vsI/AAAAAAAAioQ/GHYswFjSOx0/s1600/images.jpgenxbm.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prahlada was\nquiet different from his father. Unlike his father Prahlada never hurt another\nliving being. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was a strong devotee of\nLord . While everyone was scared of Hiranyakasipu, all the people loved\nPrahlada.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hiranyakasipu once\nasked Prahlada to come and sit on his lap. &nbsp;He lovingly stroked his 8 year old son Prahlada's hair, 'Son! What\na fine son you are! &nbsp;Tell me son, how are things going on in your Gurukul?'<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">'Father!' &nbsp;Prahlada looked at his father lovingly, 'I have\nlearnt that Vishnu \u2013 the Dark Lord is the Ruler of the Three worlds and that if\nwe are devoted to him, he will always be there for us...'<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hiranyakasipu was\nstunned for a few seconds. &nbsp;His own flesh\nand blood talking in this manner. He was terribly upset and sent for his son\u2019s\nguru.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He asked Prahlada to go\nand play with friends as he wanted to talk to the teacher alone. When the\nteacher appeared, &nbsp;Hiranyakasipu was\nfurious. &nbsp;&nbsp;He yelled at the learned guru. 'What nonsense\nhave you been teaching my son \u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Guru quailed with\nfear. He stammered, 'L..Lord...Lord...I did not teach him these things...'<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hiranyakasipu shook his\nhead furiously, 'Watch over the child! Someone is teaching him these useless\nthings...' &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The guru nodded his\nhead and quickly melted away , lest Hiranykasipu gets more pissed off..</span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At the school, &nbsp;the Guru taught Prahlada about how\nHiranyakasipu was now the Lord of the three worlds and how he was to be\nworshipped... However Prahlada countered \u201c No sir! This is not correct! &nbsp;Lord Vishnu is the Lord of the three worlds.\nThe whole universe exists because of him...'<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-w21dNFsu_c4/UZtPPaf0r-I/AAAAAAAAioI/NRieZYhAqoI/s1600/images.jpgtkcngku.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-w21dNFsu_c4/UZtPPaf0r-I/AAAAAAAAioI/NRieZYhAqoI/s1600/images.jpgtkcngku.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The guru got furious\nand afraid at the same time. &nbsp;Furious\nthat Prahlada was defying him openly in the class for all the students to hear\nand afraid that if Prahlada repeated this to his father, Hiranyakasipu may even\nkill him.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The guru dragged\nPrahlada back to his father's palace. He went to Hiranyakasipu, 'Sir! I have\ntried everything...The boy keeps on repeating what he said. He would not tell\nme from where he learnt this...'<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hiranyakasipu was now\ntrembling in rage. &nbsp;Anger blinded him.\nThis boy cannot have my blood inside him. He is no son of mine...He does not\nhave any right to live... Hiranyakasipu called his men, 'Guards! Take this boy\nand kill him with your swords.'<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The guard looked\nanxiously at Hiranyakasipu wondering whether he had indeed ordered for killing\nthe prince. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hiranyakasipu angrily\nlooked at his men and yelled three times , 'NOW!'<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prahalada calmly and\nunceasingly repeated, \u201cOm Namo Narayanaya!\u201d ( when Mangal Pandey did this in\n1857 \u2014he was accused of incoherent babbling and show on contempt by the British\n) <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They took out their\nswords. &nbsp;The first guard struck Prahlada and watched surprised as the blade fell from the hilt... Prahlad looked\nunharmed and without fear. All the guard together struck Prahlada only to find\ntheir blades breaking off even before it struck Prahlada.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bewildered they turned\nto Hiranyakasipu. &nbsp;Enraged Hiranyakasipu\nthen ordered Prahlada to be thrown into a snake pit full of cobras. &nbsp;However &nbsp;the snakes just kept off him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Furious Hiranyakasipu\nturned on mad elephants at Prahlads to trample him. &nbsp;Hiranyakasipu was stunned when he saw the mad\nelephants become calm as soon as they saw Prahalada.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-DAXhu87HxAU/UZtAb_TrRpI/AAAAAAAAimY/rAXeWvPtk2Y/s1600/images.jpgJKLGUVT.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"224\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-DAXhu87HxAU/UZtAb_TrRpI/AAAAAAAAimY/rAXeWvPtk2Y/s400/images.jpgJKLGUVT.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hiranyakasipu called\nhis sister Holika. 'Sister Holika! I need your help!'<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Holika bowed to\nHiranyakasipu, 'Speak my Lord!'<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hiranyakasipu said\nharshly, 'You have received a boon from the Lord that fire cannot harm you! I\nwant you to use that boon now.'<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201c I want you to take\nPrahlada in your lap and hold him tight, so that when I can set both of you on\nfire\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the fire finally\nburnt out, Prahlada was sitting in the middle of glowing ashes unharmed , whereas\nHolika had burnt to cinder..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-89hv7KO_GA4/UZtATINf2gI/AAAAAAAAimQ/QPOBDEOc3Hk/s1600/story-of-holika-dahan-prahlad-hiranyakashipu.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-89hv7KO_GA4/UZtATINf2gI/AAAAAAAAimQ/QPOBDEOc3Hk/s1600/story-of-holika-dahan-prahlad-hiranyakashipu.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She was unaware of the\nfact the boon worked only when &nbsp;she\nentered the fire alone. Prahlada came out unharmed while Holika was burnt to &nbsp;ashes. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now Hiranyakasipu started\nto feel that something is amiss. &nbsp;He went\nto Prahlada and pulled the boy up. &nbsp;The\nboy woke up as if from a trance, looking around him. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-IQa_37lItik/UZtOpnceXFI/AAAAAAAAing/nIHEGT3jGcw/s1600/images.jpgBJHF.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-IQa_37lItik/UZtOpnceXFI/AAAAAAAAing/nIHEGT3jGcw/s320/images.jpgBJHF.jpg\" width=\"280\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hiranyakasipu shook him, He yelled, 'Where is\nyour Vishnu now? &nbsp;Is he here inside my\npalace? &nbsp;Is he here in this pillar'\nHiranyakasipu screamed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prahalda looked at his\nfather straight in the eye, \"Yes father! Lord Vishnu is everywhere..He is all</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;pervading and is present in every atom and every pore\"</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Enraged Hiranyakashipu smashed\nhis mace on the pillar.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The pillar shattered\nand with a terrible roar a grotesque glowing and ferocious form, with the head\nof a lion and body of a man stepped out.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before Hiranyakasipu\ncould escape, Narasimha caught him with his clawed fingers, in a vice like\ngrip.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hiranyakasipu struggled\nagainst grip, but it was of no use. Narasimha took Hiranyakasipu and dragged\nhim to the threshold of the door \u2013<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-GgEtVynQtJ4/UZtPHdoMQTI/AAAAAAAAioA/olZO0AQ3h1I/s1600/download.jpg,hjkyt.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-GgEtVynQtJ4/UZtPHdoMQTI/AAAAAAAAioA/olZO0AQ3h1I/s400/download.jpg,hjkyt.jpg\" width=\"296\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brahma\u2019s voice\nresounded from the skies.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cHiranyakasipu---look where are you standing ---<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">nor in a residence or\noutside, you are at the threshhold,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">look at the time it is\nnether day or night , it is twilight,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">look who has grabbed\nyou, neither man or animal, he hold no weapons <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">look from where he has\nemerged, nether ground or sky, but from in-between a pillar.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After killing Hiranyakasipu\nwith his claws , &nbsp;Narasimha let out a\nloud roar and sat on Hiranyakasipu's throne.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All the Asuras had\nescaped from there seeing the ferocious beast. &nbsp;Even the Devas were afraid to go near\nNarasimha. &nbsp;However unafraid, Prahlad\nwent forward. &nbsp;There was nothing but love\nin his eyes. 'My Lord! You have come to protect me...I knew you would come...'<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-PifI103HLdY/UZtO-9oh2yI/AAAAAAAAin4/bdx6b-34GYE/s1600/lakshminrisimha.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-PifI103HLdY/UZtO-9oh2yI/AAAAAAAAin4/bdx6b-34GYE/s400/lakshminrisimha.jpg\" width=\"300\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Looking at the face of\nPrahlad, Narasimha smiled, 'Yes son! For you I have come!...' Prahlad looked at\nhis father's body and looked at Narasimha, 'Do not worry son! You do not know\nhis story! &nbsp;He is my ex-doorkeeper\nVijaya. &nbsp;He was born here because of a\ncurse. After three more births he will attain his place back in Vaikunta.. .Do\nnot worry about him...'<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prahlad nodded his\nhead, 'I want nothing more, my Lord!'<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Narasimha shook his\nhead, 'No son! You are meant to rule your people. You will come to Vaikunta\nafter you have completed your work on earth as your people's ruler...'<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prahlada nodded his\nhead once more. &nbsp;Prahlada became the\nbenevolent ruler of the Asuras, who prospered during his reign and gave up\nthere old cruel ways. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As per the Christian\ninvader\u2019s spin doctors&nbsp; Narasimha went berserk, totally off tangent after killing Hiranyakashipu , and could NOT be controlled.</span>\n&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Narasimha\u2019s &nbsp;wrath was not appeased. &nbsp;The cosmos &nbsp;trembled, fearing what he might do next.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-4KabBkI5LBA/UZtAky882NI/AAAAAAAAimg/qHj9Hpyem4c/s1600/images.jpgrjr.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-4KabBkI5LBA/UZtAky882NI/AAAAAAAAimg/qHj9Hpyem4c/s400/images.jpgrjr.jpg\" width=\"286\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white Christian\ninvader has put this spin into this legend to drive a wedge between Shiva and\nVishnu worshippers.&nbsp; &nbsp;Like when we were kids we always wondered if Phantom\nand Tarzan fights who will win, &nbsp;we\nformed two gripus and once we nearly came to blows.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Shiva assumed the\nterrible form of Sharabha. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Km6zC5HWaEk/UZtAFBbnp6I/AAAAAAAAimI/dv4h4JWGV3A/s1600/uyltt.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Km6zC5HWaEk/UZtAFBbnp6I/AAAAAAAAimI/dv4h4JWGV3A/s320/uyltt.jpg\" width=\"266\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Poison injected\nSharabha Upanishad portrays Sharabha with two heads, two wings, eight legs of\nthe lion with sharp claws and a long tail\u2014a human lion bird. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A sort of hyper-man to lick the mickey out of\nsuper-man. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">TEE HEEEE!!.</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white Christian\ninvader even gave Lord Shiva a nice new name \u2013 hold your breath -\n\"Sharabeshamurti\". &nbsp;TEE HEEEE\n!!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then ze gods got a new\nworry . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They feared Shiva in\nhis ferocious Sharabha form may not be able to control his rage and thus urging\nShiva to give up his Sharabha form. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thereafter, Shiva\ndismembered Sharabha\u2019s form. &nbsp;Self\ndemotion man. &nbsp;Thank God!! His limbs were\ngiven away ( to salvation army? ) and his torso became a Kapalika. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then Kapalikas became\nAghoris . &nbsp;Aghoris started eating shit , drinking\npiss and ate dead bloated corpses flowing down the river for good measure and\nstayed in cremation grounds. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TEE HEEEE !!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-rW0mlI-0RCE/UZtO5QkKpsI/AAAAAAAAinw/FoTf3dnI6vI/s1600/200px-Keladi_Rameshwara_gandaberunda.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-rW0mlI-0RCE/UZtO5QkKpsI/AAAAAAAAinw/FoTf3dnI6vI/s1600/200px-Keladi_Rameshwara_gandaberunda.JPG\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Rothschild released\nKing Wodeyar of Mysore from prison after they killed Tipu Sultan , on the\nexpress condition that his royal crest must be Sharaba . Later more and more cooked\nup versions of the Narasimha slayer have come out. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-O3WmWULtDoc/UZtDmq9RBzI/AAAAAAAAimw/esDDxPaCiLI/s1600/images.jpgtwu.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"238\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-O3WmWULtDoc/UZtDmq9RBzI/AAAAAAAAimw/esDDxPaCiLI/s320/images.jpgtwu.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gandaberunda, the\nKarnataka state emblem, is flanked by red maned yellow lion elephant Sharabha.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-p2ReFDySPeo/UZtFlmmIWCI/AAAAAAAAinI/pHhGbR3lyto/s1600/images.jpghtkyl.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nuniversity of Mysore , Karnataka has adopted Sharabha, with modifications and\nalso appropriate justifications, &nbsp;as\ntheir emblem or logo&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TEE &nbsp;HEEEE !!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-OqlEbqX9yJY/UZtFSjE_E9I/AAAAAAAAinA/V9sJc0EIl6Y/s1600/images.jpgyrye.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"276\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-OqlEbqX9yJY/UZtFSjE_E9I/AAAAAAAAinA/V9sJc0EIl6Y/s320/images.jpgyrye.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even today no orthodox\nHindu will cut his nails at twilight in respectful memory of the great action\nof Narasimha. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To add some spice they\neven said that Narasimha did NOT use his vehicle Garuda ( the eagle ) to reach\nHiranyakashipu and the bird sulked . &nbsp;So\nit was a bird NOT a vimana&nbsp; &nbsp;TEE HEEEE !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">SINCE ROTHSCHILD WAS SO MUCH &nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">INTERESTED</span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;IN NARASIMHA , IT IS POSSIBLE THAT THIS ANCIENT ELEPHANT TUSK RELIC WAS PLANTED IN THE GERMAN CAVE. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">THERE IS NO SHORTAGE OF ELEPHANTS WITH MIGHTY TUSKS IN INDIA. &nbsp; WHEN TUSKS GROW TOO LONG IT IS SAWED OFF IN KERALA.</span></b></span><br />\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-8mmdqnSJNpU/UZtQ2OJfWaI/AAAAAAAAiow/l666EMQQ9vQ/s1600/RJR.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-8mmdqnSJNpU/UZtQ2OJfWaI/AAAAAAAAiow/l666EMQQ9vQ/s400/RJR.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Adi Shankaracharya in 2000\nBC , as with the reference in the Sharabha Upanishad, refers to this 356th name\nof Vishnu sahasranama as not mentioning the lion-killing animal at all and\ninstead interprets the name to mean, \"As the Lord shines in the body as\nthe indwelling Self, He is called <b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Sharabha</span></b>, while the body is sara\n(perishable).\"<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-VXNL9rk-nis/UZtOx3C6rvI/AAAAAAAAino/Z74t7_AEUhQ/s1600/images.jpgJHHGKV.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"268\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-VXNL9rk-nis/UZtOx3C6rvI/AAAAAAAAino/Z74t7_AEUhQ/s400/images.jpgJHHGKV.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Rig Veda contains\nan epithet that has been attributed to Narasimha.&nbsp; The avatar is described as \"like a wild\nbeast, dread, prowling, mountain-roaming\"&nbsp;\n(RV.I 154.2a).</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Matsya purana\ndescribes how Narasimha ripped &nbsp;Hiranyakashipu&nbsp;\n\"apart the mighty Daitya chief as a plaiter of straw mats shreds\nhis reeds\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Lord Narasimha is\ndepicted in early epics, more than 15 Puranas and Upanishads</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Bhagavad Gita\n(10.30) Krishna makes the following statement in regard to Prahlada, showing\nhis favour towards him:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Translation:\n\"Among the Daitya demons I am the devoted Prahlada, among subduers I am\ntime, among beasts I am the lion, and among birds I am Garuda.\"<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
